articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Defamation of Celebrations in DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Defamation of Celebrations in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea has virulently defamed the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, the anniversary of the Korean Children's Union and other auspicious events in the DPRK since it committed such thrice-cursed treasons as rubbing salt into the wounds of the Korean people grieving over the great loss to the nation and daring slander the peerlessly great men.
					 A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry released a statement on Saturday disclosing the sinister aims sought by the Lee group in aggravating the situation through uninterrupted provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Through those provocations the group seeks to rattle the nerves of the DPRK in a bid to cause it to conduct a nuclear test, though such a thing is not under plan at present, and take such strong retaliatory measures as Yonphyong Island shelling incident, and hype its "belligerent nature." This scenario is aimed to strain the relations between the DPRK and the countries around it and create an atmosphere of putting pressure and sanctions on it.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has turned into a theater of military standoff among big powers and a fuse for a regional war due to the Lee group's policy of confrontation and sycophantic mendicant diplomacy.
					
					 It is the disgrace of the Korean nation and tragedy of the present times that such group of traitors exists.
					
					 That is why the international community hopes that the Lee group quits as early as possible for the detente on the peninsula and regional peace and stability.
					
					 It is in the interests of all the countries aspiring after peace and stability in the region to make the group stop going reckless and step down quietly.
					
					 Should there be countries around the peninsula ceaselessly instigating and conniving at the group's dangerous and reckless provocations in an effort to use south Korea for attaining their egoistic purposes even a bit, they will not be able to shirk the responsibility for the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Employees of Huichon Power Station No. 2
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Employees of Huichon Power Station No. 2
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent gifts to the employees of Huichon Power Station No. 2 who moved to new dwelling houses for a hundred families.
					 He showed such warm loving care as sending them goods for cultural use and various household effects including color TV sets, a reflection of leader Kim Jong Il's love for the people.
					
					 A gift-conveying ceremony took place on Saturday.

articles.title: Greetings to Portuguese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Portuguese President
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Anibal Cavaco Silva, president of Portugal, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message extended congratulations to the president and people of Portugal, wishing the president success in his work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to British Queen
articles.content:
Congratulations to British Queen
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to British Queen Elizabeth II on her official birthday, the national day of the UK.
					 Kim in the message wished her good health and happiness and the British people prosperity.

articles.title: KCU Delegates Leave Pyongyang
articles.content:
KCU Delegates Leave Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Delegates of the Korean Children's Union from South Phyongan, North and South Hwanghae provinces and Nampho City left Pyongyang by bus on Saturday after attending the celebrations of the 66th KCU birthday.
					 Pyongyang citizens waved their hands to the processions along streets.
					
					With tears in her eyes, Sin Song, a pupil of primary class at Sinhung Secondary School in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "When we departed from the April 25 Hotel, I felt as if I were leaving my own home.
					
					 Employees of the hotel and doctors had taken warm care of us day and night as our own parents do. 
					
					 I am reluctant to break with them. I want to see them again."
					
					 Kim Il Gwang, a student of Wasan Secondary School in Waudo District, Nampho City, said:
					
					 "During our stay in Pyongyang, we toured all places where I wanted to visit, including Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, the Kumsusan Place of the Sun, the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Amusement Park in Kaeson Youth Park, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and Okryu Restaurant. Every day, I wrote down in my diary what I saw and thought that I should do a lot of good things for the country.
					
					 I will be good at study to become an admirable worker for the country."
					
					 Kim Pom Su, a student of Suwon Secondary School in Sinwon County, South Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					 "For life, I will remember the happiest day when we saw the dear respected Kim Jong Un nearby.
					
					 Now I am not a mere child. I will study hard as desired by Kim Jong Un with my days in Pyongyang always kept in mind."

articles.title: KCU Delegates Delighted with Gifts
articles.content:
KCU Delegates Delighted with Gifts
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Gifts were conveyed to all delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union on June 8.
					 Upon receiving the gifts, the delegates shouted, "Thank you very much, the dear respected Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Jang Hye Hyang, a delegate from Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, told KCNA:
					
					 "Amid deep interest of all the people we, the delegates, celebrated the KCU anniversary in the presence of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and received gifts from him. We are, indeed, the happiest children.
					
					 My resolve is to be better at study and KCU organizational life, keeping his great love and solicitude deep in my mind."
					
					 Kim Hyo Ok, a delegate from Cholwon Secondary School in Cholwon County, Kangwon Province, said that she would prepare herself to be an able revolutionary talent and pillar of prosperous Korea, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, as desired by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pak Ryong Song, a delegate from Suyang Secondary School in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					 "Back home, I will tell my classmates and teachers about the facts that I experienced in the period of the celebrations, showing this gift to them.
					
					 Then, all my classmates will cherish deeper in their mind the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on posterity."

articles.title: Ryanggang Provincial Delegates of KCU Return Home
articles.content:
Ryanggang Provincial Delegates of KCU Return Home
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Delegates from Ryanggang Province left for home by special plane on Saturday, after participating in the celebrations of the 66th birthday of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					  Upon arrival, they had emotional reunions with teachers, schoolchildren and parents in the province amid warm welcome of its inhabitants.
					
					 Ryu Jong Chol, secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					 "The recent celebrations were a significant grand gathering of the KCU members, provided thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on posterity and his deep loving care.
					
					 We, the KCU delegates, were blessed with all happiness in the world. We had the celebrations in the presence of Kim Jong Un and had a photo session with him, as well.
					
					 We are now determined to live up to his deep trust and loving care."
					
					 The parents of Jon Song A, a student of Happho branch under Kwangsan Secondary School in Phungso County, said:
					
					 "We could hardly repress our feelings when seeing on TV our daughter present at the significant gathering with the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the greatest event ever in the history of our mountainous village.
					
					All the villagers burst out into cheers when Kim Jong Un was delivering a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of KCU organizations.
					
					 We will always remain intensely loyal to Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Kim Song Hyok, a student at Yonam Secondary School in Paekam County, said:
					
					 "I will always remember those happy days spent amid the blessings of all the people.
					
					 Under the slogan 'Let us learn for prosperous Korea,' I will study hard and hard to be a world-famous inventor and scientist, with the dear respected Kim Jong Un's teachings deep in my mind.
					
					 This is the unanimous pledge of all KCU members, I think."
					
					 Choe Sun Ae, a teacher at Kapsan Primary School in Kapsan County, said that Kim Jong Un is the sun for 3 million KCU members, expressing her resolve to devote all her life to instilling Kim Jong Il's patriotism into the mind of pupils."

articles.title: KCU Delegates Leave Pyongyang by Train
articles.content:
KCU Delegates Leave Pyongyang by Train
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Delegates from Jagang, South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and Kangwon provinces left the capital city of Pyongyang by train on Saturday after attending the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union.
					 Pyongyang citizens and schoolchildren saw them off at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 Prior to getting on train, Han Kyong Il, chief KCU instructor at Nammun Secondary School in Jongju City, North Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "The dear respected Kim Jong Un congratulated the KCU members throughout the country on their holiday (June 6) and had a photo session with the delegates. He also gave gifts to all of the delegates.
					
					 With this love deep in my mind, I will work hard to bring up the schoolchildren into exemplary KCU members, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy. My life will be devoted to training them to be juvenile revolutionaries and guards intensely loyal to Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Kang Kil Chong, a student from Kosan Secondary School in Manpho City, Jagang Province, said:
					
					 "In the whole period of the celebrations we were accorded warm welcome and hospitality wherever we went in Pyongyang. Everything served the delegates on a preferential basis. I had never expected such privileges.
					
					 In the future, I will do better at study and always get full marks to delight the dear respected Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Ho Su Gyong, a student from Sindok Secondary School in Tanchon City, South Hamgyong Province, said:
					
					 "It was the happiest time for me when I was listening to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's speech and having a photo taken with him.
					
					 I'd love to say that we are the happiest children in the world and sons and daughters of Kim Jong Un, the eternal sun."
					
					 Han Un Ae, a student from Wondong Secondary School in Kimhwa County, Kangwon Province, said:
					
					 "I am reluctant to leave Pyongyang where we spent unforgettable days amid the warm welcome and hospitality. The days will remain in my memory for life.
					
					 I will study hard for prosperous Korea to be dependable reserves of the Songun revolution as I pledged to the dear respected Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Everybody to Work Hard for Bright Future of Powerful Socialist Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Everybody to Work Hard for Bright Future of Powerful Socialist Country 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) was celebrated with splendor amid deep concern and blessings of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people at a stirring juncture when a new century of Juche began. This was, indeed, a significant event. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial.
					
					 It calls upon all the Korean people to work hard for a bright future of the powerful socialist country.
					
					 The recent celebrations marked a historic occasion of demonstrating the greatness of the WPK which has regarded the work of bringing up the younger generation as the most important affair and a great assembly of the successors to the revolution, a gathering that instilled into the people the deep faith in the bright future of prosperous Songun Korea, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 "Love the Future!" This is the ever-lasting slogan of the WPK. More steadfast is the will of the Korean people to make long journeys of the revolution, believing in the dear respected Kim Jong Un and following the party.
					
					 The Juche-oriented movement of the KCU has entered into a new phase of its development.
					
					 The historic speech made by Kim Jong Un at a joint national meeting of the KCU organizations serves as important guidelines for steadily developing the KCU shining with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and their feats as required by the Songun era.
					
					 All the members of the KCU should bear deep in mind the trust and expectation of Kim Jong Un and fully prepare themselves as able revolutionary talents and pillars responsible for the future of Songun Korea.
					
					 The building of a thriving socialist nation is a work for the younger generation and the most important task to be carried out by the present generation.
					
					 All party members and other working people should devote their energy and enthusiasm to the final victory of the drive for building a thriving nation, true to the noble patriotism of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Forces Opposed to June 15 Joint Declaration Are Bound to Face Severe Punishment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Forces Opposed to June 15 Joint Declaration Are Bound to Face Severe Punishment
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea has frantically escalated the confrontation with the DPRK quite contrary to the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. This treachery can never be pardoned.   
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The nation should bury these traitors in the graves of history as early as possible for escalating the confrontation between the north and the south, opposed to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 Power-greedy heavyweights of the south Korean "Saenuri Party" are now running the whole gamut of gimmicks to keep at a distance Lee Myung Bak more dead than alive, forsaken by the public, and stay in power. No matter how good they may be at deceptive trick and disguise, the clan of the "Saenuri Party" can never change in their confrontation nature and bad habit because they are successors to the tradition and quisling nature of "the yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 How to approach the north-south joint declarations at present is a touchstone distinguishing reunification from division and patriotism from treachery. The sinister attitude of the "Saenuri Party" clan denying the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the  October 4 declaration, a programmer for carrying it out, only brings to light their true colors as anti-reunification maniacs and despicable traitors. 
					
					 The declarations serve as beacons of hope and banners of victory for all Koreans at home and abroad desirous of independent reunification, peace and prosperity of Korea. 
					
					 The preservation and implementation of the declarations assure a bright prospect for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Vice-chairman of its Central Committee Paek Yong Ho left here Saturday to visit Iran.
					 John Daniszewski, vice president of the Associated Press of the U.S., and his party departed here for home on the same day.

articles.title: Korea Likely to Experience Much Rainfall in July, August
articles.content:
Korea Likely to Experience Much Rainfall in July, August 
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Rainy season is expected to begin in early July this year in Korea, while heavy rains, including downpour, are likely to hit the western coastal area and central and southern areas on the east coast between mid-July and mid-August, a local weather expert said.
					 Pang Sun Nyo, department head of the Hydro-meteorological Service, told KCNA:
					
					 "Lingering drought persists in June, too, but July-August will witness heavy rainfall.
					
					 The seasonal wind weakened in East Asia will return to normal in July and August, with high pressure from the northwest Pacific affecting Korea.
					
					 Snatchy chill will come to the northern and southern areas on the east coast in June and July-August period respectively."

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK for Int'l Exhibitions
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK for Int'l Exhibitions
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Several kinds of stamps were issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark international stamp exhibitions.
					 They include an individual stamp and a sheet which are dedicated to the World Stamp Championship and Exhibition "Indonesia 2012" and the Stamp Exhibition 2012 "Planete Timbres".
					
					 Seen in the stamp are a personified lizard in traditional national costume, letters "World Stamp Championship and Exhibition 'Indonesia 2012'" and the emblem of the exhibition.
					
					 The sheet carries pictures of the Chollima Statue and the Arch of Triumph in the city of Pyongyang on the background of the Tower of the Juche Idea and magnolia, a national flower of the DPRK, and orchid. Also seen in it are Korean and English letters "Stamp Exhibition 2012 'Planete Timbres'" and the exhibition's emblem.
					
					 Meanwhile, three kinds of individual stamps portraying rare birds have come out.

articles.title: June Tenth Independence Movement
articles.content:
June Tenth Independence Movement
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The June tenth independence movement launched on June 10, Juche 15 (1926) was an eruption of the Korean people's resentment toward the Japanese imperialists' vicious colonial rule over Korea. It was also a mass anti-Japanese patriotic struggle for retaking the national sovereignty.
					 Upset by the March First Popular Uprising that swept throughout Korea in 1919, the Japanese imperialists superficially changed their mode of colonial rule, from military rule to "cultural rule."
					
					 The "cultural rule" allegedly suggested "cultural reform of social system" and "establishment of foundation of civilized policy", but, in actuality, it was aimed to intensify suppression of the Korean people and plunder of natural resources in Korea in a more crafty and vicious way.
					
					 Frightened at the rapidly growing anti-Japanese sentiments among the Koreans in the 1920s, the Japanese imperialists introduced the notorious "secret-service police system" to sharply increase police forces. They also cooked up the law and regulations on "punishment of political offenders" and the "public order act" to kick up a sweeping repression of the people. 
					
					 Such fascist repressive rule sparked off the pent-up indignation of all the Koreans.
					
					 The independence movement, started in Seoul, developed into a nationwide struggle in a short time, involving people of all social strata.
					
					 They courageously fought with the Japanese imperialist army and police, chanting, "Independence of Korea!" and "Japanese troops, go out!"
					
					 Though the June tenth independence movement ended in a failure, the Korean people demonstrated their desire for national independence and sovereignty and shook the Japanese imperialists' colonial ruling system, disclosing their aggressive nature.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Denounces Ceaseless Scandals of Conservative Group in S. Korea
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Denounces Ceaseless Scandals of Conservative Group in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Scandals in which traitor Lee Myung Bak, Chongwadae and his families and relatives, confidants and clan of the "Saenuri Party" were involved are being disclosed one after another in south Korea these days, touching off astonishment and anger of all people.  
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Saturday released information bulletin No. 1 000 in this connection. 
					
					 It said: 
					
					 On June 4, Pak Hui Thae, former speaker of the puppet "National Assembly" of south Korea, was sentenced to one year in prison after admitting his distribution of enveloped money among members of the former "Grand National Party" (GNP) during its congress in 2008. On June 5, two secretaries of a lawmaker from the GNP were sentenced to 7 years in jail for conducting a Ddos attack on the homepage of the Central Election Committee at the time of the October 26 by-election last year. 
					
					 Earlier, Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the "Broadcasting and Communication Committee" of south Korea, and Pak Yong Jun, former vice-minister of Knowledge-based Economy, who were top-aides of Lee Myung Bak, were detained for suspected use of illegal election fund for Lee's election as "president". Choe was reported to have received 800 million won from a business group and Pak Yong Jun more than 160 million won from the same group from 2006 to 2008. 
					
					 Meanwhile, aides of Lee Sang Duk, Lee Myung Bak's elder brother, are now under investigation for the reception of a huge amount of money from SLS Group of south Korea and on the suspicion that the illegally laundered money went to the Lee Sang Duk's safe. 
					
					 All the successive puppet regimes were involved in scandals without exception. But, none of them was involved in such endless hideous scandals as what Lee Myung Bak and his families, relatives and closest confidants committed. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye of the "Saenuri Party" is also deeply involved in the Pusan Savings Bank case and Park Chung Hee-Ryuk Yong Su Foundation case. Recently, there is a suspicion that Park Geun Hye is directly involved in the Samhwa Savings Bank case in which her sister and her husband were involved. This is sparking off people's uproar. 
					
					 The scandals of the Lee group are serious enough to develop into an issue of impeachment of "president" if they had occurred in the past. 
					
					 The Democratic United Party and other opposition parties and people of different social standings brand Lee Myung Bak and Chongwadae as chief culprits of scandals and strongly demand a thorough investigation into officials up to the top echelon of power. They are threatening to leave no means untried to probe the scandals including inspection of state administration and "National Assembly" hearing, unless a strict investigation is made. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the conservative group set in motion security organs including prosecution for investigation but they dragged on the investigation under the pretext of "lack of evidence" in a bid to cover up the truth. The group simply detained a few yes men in an effort to hide its crimes. 
					
					 In the meantime, the group forced media to limit news coverage of the scandals as much as possible in a bid to bar them from sparking social furor. The group is, at the same time, working hard to lead elsewhere public attention by creating a terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of security through its despicable coloring offensive and a campaign for "eliminating forces following the north." 
					
					 A gimlet in the bulging bag is bound to protrude and a corrupt thing is bound to smell stinking and rancid. 
					
					 Crafty moves on the part of the conservative group to cover up its scandals would only spark off bitterer resentment among the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Criticism of DPRK's Satellite Launch under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Criticism of DPRK's Satellite Launch under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military authorities charged the DPRK with "making ceaseless provocations" and "posing a serious threat" at talks with their U.S. and Japanese counterparts in Singapore on June 2. The talk ended with a "joint statement", the core of which is to strengthen the tripartite cooperation. 
					 A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun on Saturday observes in this regard:
					
					 The talks showed once again the traitorous nature of the Lee Myung Bak group which is intent on doing harm to its fellow countrymen by counting on foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military added voice to U.S. and Japan's repeated criticism of the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 as "a provocation", indicative of their sinister intentions to justify the standoff with the DPRK and bring it down in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The puppet military alleged again that "the north is likely to fire additional missiles and conduct nuclear tests". The allegation is aimed to keep the steam of the confrontation with the DPRK from running out under the pretext of the satellite launch and ratchet up sanctions and pressure on it in cahoots with the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The recent military talks prove that the Lee Myung Bak group is made up of dangerous provocateurs who have gone reckless to ignite a war against the DPRK in reliance on outside forces. 
					
					 Neither alliance with U.S. and Japan nor cooperation with them will help the Lee group evade collapse.

articles.title: S. Korea's Unpopular Educational Policy Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Unpopular Educational Policy Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Teachers' Trade Unions of south Korea staged an action against the unpopular educational policy of the "government" authorities on June 6.
					 The organization accused the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology of enforcing the law on primary and secondary education the keynote of which is to amalgamate and close small schools.
					
					 This is little short of barring the rural and fishing villages from neither bringing up children nor letting them live, the organization deplored, denouncing the authorities for such market-almighty policy and dictatorial act of disregarding the education of children, crying out for economic efficiency.
					
					 The step of the "government" to forcibly close schools without any agreement with people would entail a serious collapse of rural and fishing villages, it warned.
					
					 It urged the authorities to roll back the unpopular educational policy and enact a special law on education of the children in the rural and fishing villages.

articles.title: Japan, U.S. Kick Off Reckless Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Japan, U.S. Kick Off Reckless Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Japan and the U.S. are busy staging madcap joint military exercises in a bid to ignite a war of aggression any time, seriously straining the regional situation.
					 The three-day Japan-U.S. joint military drills were kicked off on Kyusu Island, Japan on June 6.
					
					 Australia is also reported to have been involved in this saber-rattling. It is said that warships, submarines and patrol craft of the Japan maritime SDF and naval forces of the U.S. and Australia are staging the drills of detecting and pursuing submarines. 
					
					 It is the fifth time for the countries to stage such naval maneuvers since 2007.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Two Schoolgirls by U.S. Armored Car Marked
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Two Schoolgirls by U.S. Armored Car Marked
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations and personages of different social standings of south Korea formed the "Preparatory Committee for Memorial Events to Mark 10 Years Since Death of Mi Son and Hyo Sun" and issued an article on June 4. They included the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Committee for Memorial Monument to Mi Son and Hyo Sun, the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea.
					 The article said that 10 years have passed since two schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were mercilessly killed by a U.S. armored car. It accused the "government" authorities of still failing to investigate the truth behind the thrice-cursed U.S. troops' crimes, punish the arch criminal and totally revise the shackling south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement".
					
					 On the contrary, inequality of the south Korea-U.S. relations has become more pronounced and the peace of the Korean Peninsula is in a grave state, it deplored.
					
					 Still fresh in the memory of the people are those days when they held candlelight rallies against the U.S. to memorize the two slain schoolgirls, the article pointed out.
					
					 The preparatory committee declared that it would cherish the memory of the two schoolgirls through the events and wage more dynamic struggle to open a door to a new society for independence and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Denounced by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Denounced by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia on Thursday made public a statement denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for hurting again the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and malignantly efaming the celebrations of the 66th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union.
					 The Lee group of traitors committed such thrice-cursed crime as insulting the supreme headquarters, the future and symbol of the Korean nation, while the celebrations of the most auspicious Day of the Sun, 100th birthday of President Kim Il Sung, were under way, lashing all Koreans and other fair-minded people into fury. This time, too, the Lee group perpetrated such intolerable hideous provocation as seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Lee group has worked with blood-shot eyes to ignite a new war against fellow countrymen in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. It kicked up a racket over "the human rights issue in the north" in a bid to defame the DPRK and isolate it. The group was free to let loose a whole string of invectives against the DPRK whenever it was celebrating an auspicious event.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the group may make to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK, there is no one who will lend an ear to it and, on the contrary, it will only precipitate its doomsday.
					
					 The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia is of the view that if Lee does not make an apology to the nation for the hideous provocation, the nation should mete out severest punishment to him as declared by the open ultimatum of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 All the Korean nationals in Russia will wage a more dynamic movement to bury the group of traitors.

articles.title: Kyrgyz Political Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Popular Leaders
articles.content:
Kyrgyz Political Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Popular Leaders
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, in a TV appearance on May 28, referred to the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and gave his impressions of the DPRK.
					 Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed commander who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms and the founder of socialist Korea who built a genuine people's country and founder of the immortal Juche idea, the chairman said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il further developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, defended socialism and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and satellite launcher despite the imperialists' persistent moves to stifle it and consecutive years of natural disasters.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were genuine people's leaders and tender-hearted fathers who devoted all their life to the people.
					
					 Visiting the DPRK recently, I saw for myself modern factories and many apartment buildings spring up in different places. 
					
					 Free education and free medical care are in force in the DPRK and all people lead a harmonious life. 
					
					 If one watches the military parade staged for celebrating the 100th birthday of Kim Il Sung, Day of the Sun, he can know well the reason why the U.S. styling itself the world's only superpower dares not provoke the DPRK.
					
					 Only when the Juche idea is comprehensively applied to Kyrgyzstan, can a genuine people's country appear there, too.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Supported by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Supported by Bangladeshi Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee on June 3 issued bulletin "June 15 era of reunification" to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The joint declaration is a cornerstone for development of inter-Korean relations and the great programme for Korea's reunification as it indicates the ideological basis, fundamental principle for achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification and the ways for their implementation, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 No sooner had the declaration been adopted than it aroused warm support and sympathy of all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad and eye-opening events startling the world people took place one after another in the course of implementing it.
					
					 But the present south Korean conservative "government" authorities, not content with denying the declaration, are answering the DPRK's widespread proposal for dialogue with the intensified moves for confrontation and war against their fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the all the Koreans to implement the declaration to the end, regarding it as a landmark for reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will certainly achieve the peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Ukrainian Branch of the All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia on May 29 posted on its Internet website the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the country's land as befitting a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Bulgaria, Thailand
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Bulgaria, Thailand
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars on general secretary Kim Jong Il's feats were held in Bulgaria and Thailand on May 31 and June 3 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of his start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were members of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the Bulgarian Communists League, the Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association and the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand and other people.
					
					 The chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people's happiness, regarding it as his lifelong mission and noble cause to devote himself to them, and wisely led socialist Korea with politics of love and trust.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Il for having steadily developed the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, providing ever-lasting guidelines for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would invariably advance along the road of socialism, the road of Songun under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership and traits.
					
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said that while visiting the DPRK he witnessed for himself the vitality of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il and learned better that the Workers' Party of Korea is, indeed, a party mighty enough to move even the earth.
					
					 The WPK will continue winning victory after victory thanks to Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to Kim Jong Il's cause, the chairman stressed.

articles.title: CRPP publica informacion no.1000 denunciando casos de corrupcion
articles.content:
CRPP publica informacion no.1000 denunciando casos de corrupcion
 Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 9 la informacion no. 1000 con motivo de que se revelan ultimamente en el Sur de Corea los casos de corrupcion en que estan involucrados el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak, Chongwadae (Casa Azul), los parientes y colaboradores cercanos de Lee y los compinches del "Partido Saenuri", los cuales ponen consternado e indignado a todo el mundo.
					 El pasado dia 4, el ex presidente de la Asamblea Nacional Pak Hui Thae reconocio finalmente su culpabilidad en el caso de reparticion de sobres de dinero durante el Congreso del ex "Gran Partido Nacional" de 2008 y fue condenado a un ano de prision, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					 Al dia siguiente, 2 secretarios de un parlamentario del ex "Gran Partido Nacional" recibieron la pena de 7 anos de carcel por haber ejecutado el ataque Ddos contra la pagina web del comite electoral central durante las elecciones suplementarias celebradas en el Sur de Corea el 26 de octubre del ano pasado.
					
					 Anteriormente, el ex presidente de Radiodifusion y Comunicacion Choe Si Jung, conocido como brazo de Lee Myung Bak, y el ex viceministro de Economia de Conocimientos Pak Yong Jun resultaron detenidos por el cargo de haber recibido de 2006 al 2008 desde un grupo empresarial 800 millones y mas de 160 millones de wones (moneda surcoreana), respectivamente.
					
					 Se sospecha que Choe haya usado ilicitamente ese monto en la campana electoral de Lee Myung Bak por la "presidencia".
					
					 Por otra parte, se abrio la investigacion de los asesores del hermano mayor de Lee Myung Bak, Lee Sang Duk, al levantarse las sospechas de que ellos recibieron mucho dinero del Grupo SLS y ese dinero ilegalmente lavado paro al final en manos de Lee Sang Duk.
					
					 Si bien los casos de corrupcion e irregularidades son habituales en los sucesivos regimenes titeres surcoreanos, nunca antes han estallado en cadena como en el actual "poder" de Lee Myung Bak.  
					
					 Por otra parte, la opinion publica surcoreana se puso mas encolerizada al conocerse que Park Geun-hye del "Partido Saenuri" esta involucrada en los incidentes del Banco de Ahorro de Pusan y de la Fundacion Park Chung Hee-Ryuk Yong Su.
					
					 Ademas, se sospecha que ella esta vinculada tambien con el caso del Banco de Ahorro de Samhwa en que esta involucrado el matrimonio de su hermana menor. 
					
					 Si hubieran reportado en otros tiempos, tales casos habrian sido de sobra el motivo de la campana para destituir al "presidente".
					
					 Los partidos opositores, incluyendo el Partido Unido Democratico, y los habitantes de diferentes sectores calificaron a Lee Myung Bak y a Chongwadae de piezas claves de los casos de corrupcion demandando fuertemente investigar consecuentemente hasta a la elite del poder. Insisten en que en el caso contrario, usarian todos los medios para el esclarecimiento consecuente, tales como la investigacion al gobierno y la audiencia.
					
					 Amenazados por el respecto, los conservadores surcoreanos andan atareados para encubrir la verdad instigando a la fiscalia y otros organos de seguridad publica a dilatar la investigacion bajo el pretexto de la "falta de pruebas", y para salir inmunes al mandar a carcel a sus lacayos.
					
					 Por otra parte, al restringir en todo lo posible las informaciones de prensa sobre los casos de corrupcion, pretenden evitar que ellas se difundan en la sociedad. En el mismo contexto, tratan de distraer la atencion publica creando una espeluznante situacion de seguridad publica mediante la sucia ofensiva de "colores" y la "purga de fuerzas pro-Norte".
					
					 Pero, las cloacas se tornan mas apestosas por mucho que traten de taparlas.
					
					 Las astutas acciones de la banda de traidores surcoreanos, orientadas a ocultar su sucio expediente criminal, estan causando mas ira de la poblacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a esforzarse por porvenir de patria socialista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a esforzarse por porvenir de patria socialista
 Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Bajo la gran atencion y bendicion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano se celebro solemnemente el 66o aniversario de la funcion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea.
					 Con motivo de estas festividades de gran significacion el diario Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido este sabado exhorta a todo el pueblo coreano a esforzarse activamente por el radiante porvenir de la poderosa patria socialista.
					
					 Los presentes actos han mostrado claramente la grandeza del PTC que considera la formacion de las  generaciones venideras como labor de mayor importancia y dado gran confianza en el radiante porvenir de la Corea del Songun prospera.
					
					 !Amemos el futuro!, esto es la invariable consigna de lucha del PTC.  Hoy dia, se ha hecho mas firme la conviccion del pueblo coreano de seguir rectamente por el camino de la revolucion bajo la direccion del partido encabezada por el Maximo Dirigente       Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Hoy, el autoctono movimiento de ninos de Corea ha acogido una nueva etapa de desarrollo.
					
					 El historico discurso del Maximo Dirigente      hecho en el acto nacional de la ONC constituye la guia programatica en fortalecerla y desarrollarla invariablemente conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.
					
					 Todos los miembros de la ONC deben guardar profundamente la confianza y la esperanza del general Kim Jong Un y formarse como talentosos revolucionarios y futuros pilares para llevar adelante el porvenir de la Corea del Songun.
					
					 La construccion de un Estado prospero socialista es la labor para las generaciones venideras y la tarea de lucha mas importante asumida ante nuestra generacion.
					
					 Todos los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben dedicar todos sus esfuerzos por la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero en pleno acato del proposito del noble patriotismo de Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ninos de provincia de Ryanggang se reunen con sus maestros y padres
articles.content:
Ninos de provincia de Ryanggang se reunen con sus maestros y padres
 Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Los delegados infantiles de la provincia de Ryanggang, quienes tomaron parte en las festividades por el 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea, partieron este sabado de esta capital por avion especial.
					 En el terreno de su destino, ellos se reunieron con los maestros, ninos escolares y padres en la provincia siendo objeto de calurosas bienvenidas de los habitantes.
					
					 Ryu Jong Chol (39 anos de edad), secretario de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la provincia mencionada, dijo que los presentes actos, efectuados con solemnidad con motivo del dia de la fundacion de la ONC, fueron una gran reunion significativa de los miembros de esta organizacion preparada gracias a la noble concepcion de generaciones venideras y la benevolencia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y prosiguio:
					
					 Los delegados infantiles recibieron todas las fortunas existentes en este mundo. Celebraron las festividades junto con el Maximo Dirigente y tomaron una foto de recuerdo con el. Todos estan decididos a corresponder a esta gran confianza y amor.
					
					 Los padres de Jon Song A (12 anos de edad), alumna de la escuela anexa de Happho de la escuela secundaria de Kwangsan del distrito de Phungso, senalaron:
					
					 "Nos sentimos muy emocionados al ver por la TV a mi hija encontrandose en el mismo lugar significativo en que participo el Maximo Dirigente. Esta es un gran jubilo ocurrido por primera vez en esta aldea montanosa. Seguiremos con la unica voluntad al Maximo Dirigente quien preparo esta gran fiesta a ser registrada con letras doradas en la historia de 5 milenios".
					
					 Prosiguieron que al ver al Maximo Dirigente pronunciando el discurso de felicitacion en el acto nacional de la ONC, todos los moradores de la aldea gritaron a toda voz "!viva!"
					
					 Kim Song Hyok (12 anos de edad), alumno de la escuela secundaria de Yon-am del distrito de Paek-am, destaco:
					
					 "Nunca olvidare los dias dichosos pasados bajo la bendicion de todo el pueblo. Estudiare con mas afan guardando en el corazon las instrucciones del Maximo Dirigente de no malgastar los tiempos levantando la consigna de estudiar para la Corea prospera y asi sere el futuro inventor y cientifico de talla mundial. Pienso que esta sera tambien la unanime decision de todos los miembros de la ONC".
					
					 Choe Sun Ae (32 anos de edad), profesora de la escuela primaria de Kapsan del distrito de igual nombre, alabo al Maximo Dirigente como sol de 3 millones de miembros de la ONC y decidio dedicar todo lo suyo a armar a los estudiantes con el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il teniendo presente el deber honroso de la educadora que ensena a los futuros de Corea.
